com.nokia.maps.map

Interface MapPolyline

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MapObject

    public interface MapPolyline
extends MapObject
    This interface defines an object which has multiple points that are traversed in order. The line between two consecutive points is always straight and defined by the shortest way between these two points.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getColor()
      This method retrieves the current polyline drawing color.
      GeoCoordinate getNearest(GeoCoordinate coord)
      This method retrieves the coordinate on the polyline which is the nearest to the input coordinate.
      int getNearestIndex(GeoCoordinate coord)
      This method retrieves the index in the path which is the closest to the given coordinate.
      void setColor(int argb)
      This method sets the polyline color to the specified ARGB values.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.nokia.maps.map.MapObject

        getBoundingBox, getParent, getzIndex, isVisible, setVisible, setzIndex

    • Method Detail

      • getNearest

        GeoCoordinate getNearest(GeoCoordinate coord)
        This method retrieves the coordinate on the polyline which is the nearest to the input coordinate.
        Parameters:
        coord - An object containing the input coordinates.
        Returns:
        An object containing the coordinates on the polyline that are nearest to the input coordinate

      • getNearestIndex

        int getNearestIndex(GeoCoordinate coord)
        This method retrieves the index in the path which is the closest to the given coordinate.
        Parameters:
        coord - An object containing the coordinates
        Returns:
        The index closest to the given coordinate

      • setColor

        This method sets the polyline color to the specified ARGB values.

        Parameters:
        argb - the color to set
